fields.name: key
projectId
fields.doc: Project identifier. Null if unknown or the user is not enrolled in a project.

fields.name: userId
fields.doc: User Identifier created during the enrolment.

fields.name: sourceId
fields.doc: Unique identifier associated with the source.
Key of a Kafka SinkRecord

fields.name: value

type.name: FitbitActivityLogRecord
type.doc: Fitbit Activity Log record, containing the aggregate data of a single activity. This data is preprocessed by Fitbit, using algorithms based on the intraday data.

fields.name: time
fields.doc: Start time of the activity, time since the Unix Epoch (s).

fields.name: timeReceived
fields.doc: Time that this record was collected by a connector. Start time of the activity, seconds since the Unix Epoch (s).

fields.name: timeZoneOffset
fields.doc: Time zone offset compared to UTC (s).

fields.name: timeLastModified
fields.doc: Time when the record was last modified, time since the Unix Epoch (s).

fields.name: duration
fields.doc: Duration of the activity (s).

fields.name: durationActive
fields.doc: Duration of the part of the activity where the participant was active (s).

fields.name: id
fields.doc: Activity log ID.

fields.name: name
fields.doc: Activity name. Null if none or unknown.

fields.name: logType
fields.doc: Type of log, e.g. manual. Null if unknown.

fields.name: type
fields.doc: Fitbit-generated ID of the type of activity. Null if unknown.

fields.name: source

type.name: FitbitSource
type.doc: A single fitbit source, e.g. a watch or an app.

fields.name: id
fields.doc: Source id.

fields.name: name
fields.doc: Source name. Null if unknown.

fields.name: type
fields.doc: Source type. Null if unknown.

fields.name: url
fields.doc: Source URL. Null if unknown.
Source of the data. Null if unknown.

fields.name: manualDataEntry

type.name: FitbitManualDataEntry
type.doc: Indicates values in an activity log that are entered manually by the user, instead of being automatically collected by a device.

fields.name: distance
fields.doc: Whether the distance field was manually entered. Null if unknown.

fields.name: energy
fields.doc: Whether the energy field was manually entered. Null if unknown.

fields.name: steps
fields.doc: Whether the steps field was manually entered. Null if unknown.
Indicates what values of this record are entered manually. Null if unknown.

fields.name: energy
fields.doc: Estimated of energy expended during the activity (kJ). Null if unknown.

fields.name: levels

type.name: FitbitActivityLevels
type.doc: Aggregate activity levels during an activity.

fields.name: durationSedentary
fields.doc: Duration that the activity level was considered sedentary (s). Null if unknown.

fields.name: durationLightly
fields.doc: Duration that the activity level was considered light (s). Null if unknown.

fields.name: durationFairly
fields.doc: Duration that the activity level was considered fair (s). Null if unknown.

fields.name: durationVery
fields.doc: Duration that the activity level was considered very high (s). Null if unknown.
Levels of activity. Null if unknown.

fields.name: heartRate

type.name: FitbitActivityHeartRate
type.doc: Aggregate heart rate as measured over an activity. The heart rates are divided amongst so-called heart rate zones. A heart rate zone is a range of heart rates and it does not overlap with other heart rate zones. These zones are called, in order of increasing heart rate, 'Out of Range', 'Fat Burn', 'Cardio', and 'Peak'. Fitbit uses the common formula of 220 minus your age to estimate your maximum heart rate. The 'Out of Range' zone has heart rates up to 50 percent of maximum heart rate, the 'Fat Burn' has heart rates up to 70 percent of maximum heart rate, 'Cardio' up to 85 percent of maximum heart rate and the 'Peak' range has heart rates higher than that.

fields.name: mean
fields.doc: Mean heart rate over the duration of an activity (bpm). Null if unknown.

fields.name: min
fields.doc: Minimum heart rate for the duration of an activity (bpm). Null if unknown.

fields.name: max
fields.doc: Maximum heart rate for the duration of an activity (bpm). Null if unknown.

fields.name: minFatBurn
fields.doc: Threshold heart rate above which a the heart rate is considered in the heart rate zone 'Fat Burn' (bpm), up to the value of the minCardio field. Null if unknown.

fields.name: minCardio
fields.doc: Threshold heart rate above which a the heart rate is considered in the heart rate zone 'Cardio' (bpm), up to the value of the minPeak field. Null if unknown.

fields.name: minPeak
fields.doc: Threshold heart rate above which a the heart rate is considered in the heart rate zone 'Peak' (bpm). Null if unknown.

fields.name: durationOutOfRange
fields.doc: Duration in the heart rate zone 'Out Of Range', which is the lowest heart rate zone (s). Null if unknown.

fields.name: durationFatBurn
fields.doc: Duration in the heart rate zone 'Fat Burn', which is the second lowest heart rate zone (s). Null if unknown.

fields.name: durationCardio
fields.doc: Duration in the heart rate zone 'Cardio', which is the third lowest heart rate zone (s). Null if unknown.

fields.name: durationPeak
fields.doc: Duration in the heart rate zone 'Peak', which is the highest heart rate zone (s). Null if unknown.
Heart rate aggregate information collected during the activity. Null if unknown.

fields.name: steps
fields.doc: Number of steps made during the activity. Null if unknown or if the type of activity is not step-based.

fields.name: distance
fields.doc: Distance covered during the activity (km). Null if unknown or if the type of activity is not distance-based.

fields.name: speed
fields.doc: Mean speed during the activity (km/h). Null if unknown or if the type of activity is not distance-based.
Value of a Kafka SinkRecord
